trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: EditorPartDesigner is a public implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> base class for the purpose of rendering <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: EditorPartDesigner é uma implementação pública do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>classe para fins de renderização base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>

trans-unit.source: It adds the capability of carrying zone information from the associated control into design view, but does not otherwise change the functionality of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Ele adiciona a capacidade de carregar informações de zona do controle associado ao modo de design, mas tem alterações não precisam ter a funcionalidade do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: As with other control designers, you can change the design-time rendering of custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls by inheriting from EditorPartDesigner and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como com outros designers de controle, você pode alterar o processamento de tempo de design de personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles herdando EditorPartDesigner e substituindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: If you want to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> method, be sure to include the base implementation so as to retain zone information.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A>método, certifique-se de incluir a implementação base para reter informações de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to render at design time.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle processar em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é substituído para copiar informações de zona para o controle de exibição.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.

Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref>, and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o controle reside em uma zona do tipo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref>e, em seguida, obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design, ou marcação de erro se o controle não reside em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle associado com o designer.
